synopsis.text: Summoning every ounce of courage, Hitori Bocchi, a socially anxious girl, embarks on a daunting mission to befriend her entire middle school class, as her only childhood friend, Yawara Kai, has challenged her to do so in order to remain friends. Bocchi's extreme social anxiety causes her to faint, vomit, and even devise elaborate schemes to avoid social interactions. However, when left alone, she exudes self-confidence and concocts wild plans. As she navigates the trials and tribulations of making friends, Bocchi's unwavering determination and unique quirks make for an endearing and heartwarming tale of self-discovery and friendship.
